data.pidgin: Ho, you one Mano? 'Cause you lookin' like the top of the food chain, sistah.
data.english: Wow, are you a shark? Because you look like the top of the food chain!

data.pidgin: You must be my Saimin order, 'cause you got everything I want inside.
data.english: You must be my saimin order because you have everything I want!

data.pidgin: I thought I was hungry, but when I see you, I forget 'bout da bentos.
data.english: I thought I was hungry, but when I see you, I forget about the bentos!

data.pidgin: My house not fancy, but if you come over, I can teach you how to say 'I love you' in Pidgin.
data.english: My house isn't fancy, but I can teach you to say 'I love you' in Pidgin!

data.pidgin: Eh, let's go throw net later... and catch one lifetime of happiness.
data.english: Let's go fishing and catch a lifetime of happiness together!

data.pidgin: You one Puka shell necklace? 'Cause I wanna keep you close to my heart, all da time.
data.english: Are you a puka shell necklace? Because I want to keep you close to my heart!
